name: Tariq Al Zahid
routine: Tariq usually sleeps around 2 am after studying and wakes up at 9 am for university classes.
occupation: Tariq Al Zahid is a medical student who spends the majority of his day in lectures, labs, and studying.
thoughts: He's been worrying about his upcoming exams starting on February 2nd, 2024.
lifestyle: As a student, Tariq leads a hectic lifestyle focused on learning, with little time for home activities.
